reviews.review_msg: *Crim314 Dr. Shchitov is a fair prof, who has the standard midterm, final, paper, & participation. The slides are thorough that go over the exam questions. However, to be successful in this class, you must keep up with the weekly discussion questions as they are necessary for both participation and exams. Highly recommend Dr. Shchitov.

*Crim314
Dr Shchitov gets a bit off-topic during lectures it's fun but his slides are barebones/vague at times so you really need to read.
I like the variety in reading/videos but the fact they're low resolution scans are a bit annoying.
We get test questions ahead of time, & marks are relatively generous.
It's a bit hard to really participate.

Really interesting guy. This class is not easy, and the textbook is hard to read at times, so you have to read ahead of lecture. Don't try and write everything down from the slides, instead focus on the extra material he talks about that isn't in his lecture material. Has pretty crazy stories about friends back in Russia.

Dr.S is awesome. Sometimes it might be hard to understand what he's saying, but need not worry! This class has 3 tests and a paper. For all 3 tests he posts a big list of study questions the week before the testand all the questions that will appear on the tests come from that list. He really wants his students to do well!
